body_html:
Hmm that's weird. I just tried the repro you posted and it gave me

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "tmp2.py", line 8, in <module>
    t_sample = t_dist.rsample()
  File "/home/apaszke/pytorch/torch/distributions/gamma.py", line 55, in rsample
    value = _standard_gamma(self.concentration.expand(shape)) / self.rate.expand(shape)
  File "/home/apaszke/pytorch/torch/distributions/gamma.py", line 12, in _standard_gamma
    return concentration._standard_gamma()
RuntimeError: _standard_gamma is not implemented for type torch.cuda.FloatTensor

which is reasonable (and will be fixed by #6855). Can you please try that again with a newer commit?

body:
Hmm that's weird. I just tried the repro you posted and it gave me
```
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "tmp2.py", line 8, in <module>
    t_sample = t_dist.rsample()
  File "/home/apaszke/pytorch/torch/distributions/gamma.py", line 55, in rsample
    value = _standard_gamma(self.concentration.expand(shape)) / self.rate.expand(shape)
  File "/home/apaszke/pytorch/torch/distributions/gamma.py", line 12, in _standard_gamma
    return concentration._standard_gamma()
RuntimeError: _standard_gamma is not implemented for type torch.cuda.FloatTensor
```
which is reasonable (and will be fixed by #6855). Can you please try that again with a newer commit?
